languages.text: "Это ужасно! Никто не должен проходить через такие мучения!"
"That is awful! No one should be subjected to such torment!"
languages.original_text: "Это ужасно! Никто не должен проходить через такие мучения!"

traits.locale_text: "That is awful! No one should be subjected to such torment!"
"That is awful! No one should be subjected to such torment!"
"That is awful! No one should be subjected to such torment!"
"That is awful! No one should be subjected to such torment!"
"That is awful! No one should be subjected to such torment!"
"That is awful! No one should be subjected to such torment!"

languages.text: «¡Eso es espantoso! ¡Nadie debería someterse a semejante tormento!».
languages.original_text: "That is awful! No one should be subjected to such torment!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Eso es espantoso! ¡Nadie debería someterse a semejante tormento!».

languages.text: 「酷い話だ！こんな拷問は誰も受けるべきじゃない！」
languages.original_text: "That is awful! No one should be subjected to such torment!"

traits.locale_text: 「酷い話だ！こんな拷問は誰も受けるべきじゃない！」

languages.text: “这实在是太可怕了！没人理当遭受这样的折磨！”
languages.original_text: "That is awful! No one should be subjected to such torment!"

traits.locale_text: “这实在是太可怕了！没人理当遭受这样的折磨！”

languages.text: "Das ist furchtbar. Niemand sollte solchen Qualen ausgesetzt werden!"
languages.original_text: "That is awful! No one should be subjected to such torment!"

traits.locale_text: "Das ist furchtbar. Niemand sollte solchen Qualen ausgesetzt werden!"

languages.text: « C'est affreux ! Personne ne devrait subir pareil tourment ! »
languages.original_text: "That is awful! No one should be subjected to such torment!"

traits.locale_text: « C'est affreux ! Personne ne devrait subir pareil tourment ! »

languages.original_text: "That is awful! No one should be subjected to such torment!"
